main event: A shiny white object was observed turning pinkish and then disappearing, possibly related to sky writing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The object was observed to have a shiny white color that turned to a pinkish shade,The UFO was thought to be either a balloon or an aircraft,The witness's location was described as the business section of Metairie, Louisiana,There were reports of the object from a sergeant at the airport describing it as bright red and blue, hovering around 2000 feet.
sighted object: a shiny white object turning pinkish
witness description: a 44-year-old female, who observed the object while rolling home in her automobile
